message: Let's start fair! I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We have lots of rounds to negotiate, so let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. We both get a decent share, and it leaves room for negotiation in the future. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to compromise, let's split it evenly. 50/50 is a fair starting point for the rest of the rounds.
